bug.author: ns1123
bug.summary: Alluxio 'du' command doesn't properly report the amount of data in Alluxio
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 1.8.1 Describe the bug When using the Alluxio du -s -h command, the value for 'In Alluxio' is not correctly reported. To Reproduce Write data to a directory with writetype MUST_CACHE run 'bin/alluxio fs du -s -h /path/to/directory/' Note that the field for 'In Alluxio' says 0B. Expected behavior The value for 'In Alluxio' should show the amount of data stored in Alluxio for the given directory.
